definitions: the action or process of distributing things or people over a wide area

examples.text: the dispersal of people to increasingly distant suburbs

shortDefinitions: action or process of distributing or spreading things or people over wide area

definitions: the splitting up of a group or gathering of people, causing them to leave in different directions

examples.text: the dispersal of the crowd by mounted police

shortDefinitions: splitting up of group of people

definitions: the splitting up and selling off of a collection of artifacts or books

examples.text: the dispersal of the John Willett Collection

shortDefinitions: splitting up and selling off of collection of artefacts or books
